Text.val: Author : Asaf Kehati
Creation date : 24-03-2006
this report use to be a special report for MEXX (MEXX is not a customer of us
anymore) now we use this report for the Begium office (01.11.2007)
06.08.2014 AS SCR#18653 added parameter pi.IsDirectory(False) to GB333 call
29.11.2012 AS SCR#17740 outgoing file is zipped before sending as attachment
29.11.2012 SH SCR17738 Changed back 4 virtual (SQL output parameters) back to Alpha because of cast to char in DSQL
29.06.2011 JH SCR16567 Fixed bug in SQL selection (ADMN_CURRENCY)
06.05.2011 JOH SCR16404 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
28.08.2008 SH SCR13778 Added columns Registration no, Contact person
27.12.2007 AK SCR13216 Enable the send mail function
05.11.2007 AK SCR13053 Changes in Spec
01.11.2007 AK SCR13053 made some changes for Belgium
20.03.2007 AK SCR12370 change GNRD from 82 to 85
11.05.2006 AK SCR11110 change the name of output file and add possibility
for Multi e-mail addresses
replace ' ; ' with ',' in the e-mail address list
set number of days to 120
set number of tdays to 999
Switch system language to GB laguage , in which report has to be produced
GET SYS TEMP PATH
all commecial client
one client
admin = 3
File is larger than specified in gset(365). If this is the case we zip it and send a zipfile instead
zip succeeded, delete uncompressed file and ensure that zip is sent instead ..
Switch back to user laguage

STP.TXT: M I S S I N G P A R A M E T E R / S
GNRD - G E N E R A L D I R E C T O R Y (ENTRY 85) I S E M P T Y

ExpSyntax.val: 'GB333 failed to compress file ' & Trim({0,10}) & ' with error' & Trim(Str({0,14},''))

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT debb_debc_no, debb_actinvah, clnt101_admno, clnt102_clntno, clnt103_comm_clntno, clnt110_name1, invo_aactualh, invo_ainitialh, invo_duedate, CAST (invo_holdcode as char(1)) as invo_holdcode, invo_markcodespec, invo_previousmarkcodespec, CAST (( CASE WHEN (invo_invdate>=':3' AND invo_codinterestinvoice='Y') THEN 'Y' else 'N' END)as CHAR(1)) AS intrest_note, CAST ((CASE WHEN (invo_aactualh<>0) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) as CHAR(1)) AS open_note, CAST ((CASE WHEN (debc_markcodespecialacc=9) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) as CHAR(1)) AS debc_markcodespecialacc_9, debc_debc, debc_name, debc_totnlegalcases, debc_reinsurancelim, debc_reinsurancelimcurr, CASE WHEN (debc_markcodespecialacc=9) THEN dcmo_paidamount ELSE 0 END AS bad_debts, debh_hadr_name1, debh_hadr_name2, debh_hadr_country, debh_no, debc_country, debc_creditlimit, debc_clcurr, debc_financelimit, debc_financelimitcurr, debc_reinsurancetype, dhic_id, infs_dhic_id_picturemask, debp_contactperson
FROM :1/debb RIHGT JOIN :1/clnt ON clnt101_admno=debb_admno AND clnt102_clntno=debb_clntno :2 JOIN :1/invo ON debb_debc_no = invo_debc_no AND (invo_aactualh<>0 OR invo_invdate>=':3' AND invo_codinterestinvoice='Y') JOIN :1/debc ON debb_debc_no = debc_no JOIN :1/admn ON admn_no = clnt101_admno JOIN :1/dcmo ON dcmo_debc_no = debb_debc_no and dcmo_year = :4 and dcmo_month = :5 and dcmo_currency = admn_currency JOIN :1/debh ON debc_debh = debh_no left outer join :1/dhic ON dhic_debh = debc_debh and dhic_infs_code = 'BE' left outer join :1/infs ON infs_code = dhic_infs_code left outer join :1/debp ON debp_dept_code = '003' and debp_debh_no = debc_debh and debp_debc_no = debc_no and debp_no = 1 WHERE debb_actinvah<>0
ORDER BY clnt102_clntno,debc_debc_sort for fetch only optimize for 100 row

Text.val: Calculate reinsurance limit in ADMNL_CURRENCY (if necessary)
Calculate credit limit in ADMN_CURRENCY (if necessary)
Calculate finance limit in ADMN_CURRENCY (if necessary)
v.Overrun limit
Deduct first from ageing due-date >pi.NUMBEREOFDAYS
Deduct first from ageing due-date 91 - 120 (only if credit is not 0)
Deduct from ageing due-date 61-90 (only if credit is still not fully deduct)
Deduct from ageing due-date 31-60 (only if credit is still not fully deduct)
Deduct from ageing due-date 01-30 (only if credit is still not fully deduct)
if there's still credit for deduction it will unconditionally fully deduct from
"L1.Not due" (even if it will result in negative balance)
only if open note (outstanding)
only if intrest note (open or close)
(AK SCR13053 v.intrest_note is not in use anymore)
if one of the outstanding invoices is on hold then v.hold is 'Y'
(AK SCR13053 v.hold is not in use anymore)
if markcodespec (on debtor or invo level) is 9 - DIV='Y'
(AK SCR13053 v.DIV not in use anymore)
